title: On 320 - 02 BR- Rs,39 Mil - high Floor
details:
On Three 20
A brand new, fully-furnished, 2 bedroom apartment for sale at OnThree 20 with a great view of the garden. This 907 Sq. Ft. apartment offers 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a living area with balcony and a great view of the city. It is also fully tilled and air-conditioned and includes a parking slot in the car park.
Facilities include a building management system, standby power, broadband infrastructure, swimming pool/lap pool/kiddies pool, a gymnasium, a large club house, BBQ pits, a business centre, squash court, steam room and an indoor games room.•24 Hour Security
39 million ( USD 237000 ),

Please call Shehan 0763104146
No Brokers please
